text: Avaŋ 34.18 CV 12.14-20, Wkp 23.6-8, Nam 28.16-25 Abipɨ hɨvɨ namɨlaŋ Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ agadɨ vala vehalaŋ uami. Hameŋ sadaŋ avaŋ Abipɨ agadɨ hɨvɨ iadɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha sɨmɨŋ hekɨlɨ hɨlanana saŋ ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ iguadin uami. Iadɨ ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lubiahɨlavɨla uaiaŋ human limu fɨhala human limu ahica cɨjɨŋ agɨladɨ hɨvɨ maci sakɨvakɨva agɨladɨ nɨhalaŋ uami.
